summary: In 1927, in Kingdom County, Vermont, a large dam is to be built, however, Noel Lord, a logger and cedar-oil harvester, won't give up his lifetime lease on land that will be flooded. The dam... See full summary Â»
cast: Rip Torn|Tantoo Cardinal|Bill Raymond|Mark Margolis|Michael J. Fox|George Woodard|Yusef Bulos|John Griesemer|Jeri Lynn Cohen|Treat Williams|Amy Wright|Rusty De Wees|Dennis Mientka|John Rothman|Sam Lloyd Sr.|Burt Porter|Tony Washburn|Alexis del Banco|Calvin Longe
title: Where the Rivers Flow North
